constructor.details: For each new exit game contract, it should take at least 3 * minExitPeriod to start take effect to protect existing transactions.     see: https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/172          https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/197

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).details: Exposes information about exit games quarantine

params._contract: address of the exit game contract

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).return: boolean whether the contract is safe to use and is not under quarantine.

registerExitGame(uint256,address,uint8).details: emits ExitGameRegistered event to notify clients

params._contract: address of the exit game contract.
params._protocol: protocol of the transaction, 1 for MVP and 2 for MoreVP.
params._txType: tx type that the exit game want to register to.

exitGameToTxType(address).notice: public getter for getting tx type with exit game address

exitGames(uint256).notice: public getter for getting exit game address with tx type

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).notice: Checks whether the contract is safe to use and is not under quarantine

protocols(uint256).notice: public getter for getting protocol with tx type

registerExitGame(uint256,address,uint8).notice: Register an exit game within the PlasmaFramework. The function can only be called by the maintainer.
